text: For what it's worth I had advice from fancy accountants that gambling proceeds that happen to be in crpto are going to be tax free. What isnt tax free is any incidental cap gain due to timing of going in and out of fiat into whatever coin is used. Obviously betting using ETH or BTC is making two bets at once, the sports bet + the coin price bet, which is unlikely to be what you want. So stick to stablecoins like USDC or USDT.
